summary: Build a business website for Nexeme Pest Control Pvt Ltd.
architectural_notes: Website should display business contact info: Mobile 9053146001, Email inkhiya14@gmail.com.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Simple professional logo mark for “Nexeme Pest Control Pvt Ltd” with a clean pest-control motif (nexeme-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide homepage hero banner image showing a clean, modern home/service scene with subtle pest-control theme, no text (nexeme-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for “Nexeme Pest Control Pvt Ltd” with clear business branding and the following sections/pages: Home, Services, About, and Contact.
Display the provided contact information prominently on the Contact section/page and in the site footer: Phone: 9053146001, Email: inkhiya14@gmail.com.

Add a Services section that lists common pest control service categories in clear English (e.g., general pest control, termite control, cockroach control, rodent control, mosquito control, bed bug control) with short descriptions.
Add basic SEO and sharing metadata (document title, meta description, and an Open Graph title/description) using the business name “Nexeme Pest Control Pvt Ltd”.

Establish a cohesive, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a professional pest control business, and apply it consistently across all pages. Avoid a blue/purple primary palette.
Add the required generated images to the project as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them on the site (logo in header/footer; hero image on Home).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for Nexeme Pest Control Pvt Ltd including business contact details (phone and email).
